qa_pairs.item: Why / you / hurry / so much ?
qa_pairs.answer: Why are you hurrying so much?

qa_pairs.item: The weather / not look / very good
qa_pairs.answer: The weather isn’t looking very good.

qa_pairs.item: We / wait / for the manager
qa_pairs.answer: We’re waiting for the manager.

qa_pairs.item: I / call / a taxi / now ?
qa_pairs.answer: Am I calling a taxi now?

qa_pairs.item: He / not talk / to the press / today
qa_pairs.answer: He isn’t talking to the press today.

qa_pairs.item: What / your sister / cook / for the party ?
qa_pairs.answer: What is your sister cooking for the party?

questions.instructions: Make present continuous sentences and questions (positive and negative). Use contractions where possible.

example.item: I / not wear / a sweater today
example.answer: I’m not wearing a sweater today.

qa_pairs.item: My parents / have / a quiet night / at home
qa_pairs.answer: My parents are having a quiet night at home.

qa_pairs.item: Where / the dog / sleep / now ?
qa_pairs.answer: Where is the dog sleeping now?

qa_pairs.item: I / not finish / my essay / this week
qa_pairs.answer: I’m not finishing my essay this week.

qa_pairs.item: She / study / hard / for her medical test
qa_pairs.answer: She’s studying hard for her medical test.

qa_pairs.item: They / listen / to the band ?
qa_pairs.answer: Are they listening to the band?

qa_pairs.item: We / not argue / about the bill
qa_pairs.answer: We aren’t arguing about the bill.

qa_pairs.item: Why / you / change / your clothes ?
qa_pairs.answer: Why are you changing your clothes?

questions.instructions: Make present continuous sentences and questions (positive and negative). Use contractions where possible.

example.item: I / not wear / a sweater today
example.answer: I’m not wearing a sweater today.

qa_pairs.item: The team / not play / well / tonight
qa_pairs.answer: The team isn’t playing well tonight.

qa_pairs.item: What / the baby / drink / in the bottle ?
qa_pairs.answer: What is the baby drinking in the bottle?

qa_pairs.item: I / talk / to my brother / on the phone
qa_pairs.answer: I’m talking to my brother on the phone.

qa_pairs.item: She / have / a party / next weekend
qa_pairs.answer: She’s having a party next weekend.

qa_pairs.item: He / work / late / tonight ?
qa_pairs.answer: Is he working late tonight?

qa_pairs.item: We / not drive / because of the traffic
qa_pairs.answer: We aren’t driving because of the traffic.

qa_pairs.item: Where / they / meet / their friends ?
qa_pairs.answer: Where are they meeting their friends?
